nodes.name: Daily Trigger (10:00 AM)
nodes.notes: Runs once per day at 10:00 AM to process new jobs

nodes.name: Read Jobs from Sheets
nodes.notes: Reads all rows from the 'jobs' sheet

nodes.name: Filter: status = ready or in_progress
nodes.notes: Filters jobs to only process 'ready' or 'in_progress' status

nodes.name: Function: Build JobRow
nodes.notes: Maps Sheets row to JobRow structure

nodes.name: Function: Extract JD Insights
nodes.notes: Extracts keywords, requirements, and nice-to-haves from JD text

nodes.name: Function: Build Paths
nodes.notes: Generates output folder and file paths for resume/cover letter

nodes.name: Execute: Run Pipeline
nodes.notes: Runs the full Node.js pipeline for this job (resume, cover letter, contacts, emails)

nodes.name: Split In Batches
nodes.notes: Processes jobs one at a time

nodes.name: Update Job Status
nodes.notes: Updates job status to 'completed' after pipeline runs
